Public Bins 0.1

(Comments welcome!)

Bins provided by councils for public use.

→ Find datasets tagged [public-bins] on data.gov.au

General recommendations:

  Recommendation
Format Point data. CSV (preferred), GeoJSON
Dataset name [Council name] Public Bins
data.gov.au tag public-bins, ocd-public-bins, ocd-public-bins-0.1

Required fields

Field Description
lat, lon Latitude, longitude, decimal degrees. (EPSG:4326)

Recommended fields

Field Description
operator The council (or company) that operates the station.
contact_ph The station's telephone number.

Optional fields

Field Description
location Description of where the bin is located.
info_url URL of area where bin is located (e.g. park, facility, etc) or of operator responcibile for managing the bin.
type Type of bin. Could be one of cigarette, waste or recycling
